Randsburg City Jail.knownFor: “ HISTORICAL JAIL HOUSE ” Reviewed 2 weeks ago As you enter Randsburg from Highway 395 this structure is the welcome mat for the city of Randsburg. It is located just inside the city limits of the town. There is a sign, historical marker along with the jailhouse. Inside are the 2 cells, each occupied. One by a miner and the other a salooon gal.
